title: Woman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to go to mcdonalds, charge your phone, twerk, be bisexual, eat hot chip, or lie.
- Going to mcdonalds gives you food, giving you basic defense tonight
- Charging your phone gives you an additional charge of all abilities
- Twerk roleblocks all your visitors
- Be bisexual roleblocks a player of your choice
- Eat hot chip lowers the defense of one player of your choice tonight
- Lying frames a player of your choice tonight

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune when twerking or being bisexual
- Each ability only has one charge

desc:
Post 3572
*born after 1993 can't cook... all they know is mcdonald's, charge they phone, twerk, be bisexual, eat hot chip & lie*
